cjminecraft.core.client.gui

Class EnergyBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiButton
        • cjminecraft.core.client.gui.EnergyBar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnergyBarOverlay

    public class EnergyBar
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.GuiButton
    Draw a simple EnergyBar which represents the energy inside of a TileEntity

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnergyBar

        public EnergyBar(int buttonId,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 long energy,
                 long capacity)
        Initialize the EnergyBar
        Parameters:
        buttonId - The id of the button
        x - The x position of the EnergyBar
        y - The y position of the EnergyBar
        energy - The amount of energy in the EnergyBar (can be 0)
        capacity - The maximum amount of energy in the EnergyBar (can be 0)

      • EnergyBar

                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 long energy,
                 long capacity)
        Initialize the EnergyBar
        Parameters:
        buttonId - The id of the button
        x - The x position of the EnergyBar
        y - The y position of the EnergyBar
        width - The width of the EnergyBar
        height - The height of the EnergyBar
        energy - The amount of energy in the EnergyBar (can be 0)

      • EnergyBar

        public EnergyBar(int buttonId,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 long energy,
                 long capacity,
                 net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation texture,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Initialize the EnergyBar
        Parameters:
        buttonId - The id of the button
        x - The x position of the EnergyBar
        y - The y position of the EnergyBar
        energy - The amount of energy in the EnergyBar (can be 0)
        capacity - The maximum amount of energy in the EnergyBar (can be 0)
        texture - The texture for the EnergyBar
        width - The width of the EnergyBar in the texture
        height - The height of the EnergyBar in the texture

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(net.minecraft.client.Minecraft mc)
        Use this in the action performed to be able to cycle the EnergyUnits.EnergyUnit when you click the EnergyBar
        Parameters:
        mc - Instance of Minecraft used for the press sound

      • updateEnergyBar

        public void updateEnergyBar(long energy,
                            long capacity)
        Update the values inside of the EnergyBar Should update every time the game is rendered
        Parameters:
        energy - The energy in the EnergyBar
        capacity - The maximum amount of energy in the EnergyBar

      • updateEnergyBar

        Update the values inside of the EnergyBar Should update every time the game is rendered
        Parameters:
        data - Holds the data regarding the energy inside
